snippet: The man who took five firefighters hostage in Suwanee on Wednesday lured them to his home by saying he had a medical emergency and was lying in bed when they arrived to help, police said on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: The man who took five firefighters hostage in Suwanee on Wednesday lured them to his home by saying he had a medical emergency and was lying in bed when they arrived to help, police said on Thursday.
